basic_flat_buffer::commit

Append writable bytes to the readable bytes.

Synopsis 
void
commit(
    std::size_t n);
Description

Appends n bytes from the start of the writable bytes to the end of the readable bytes. The remainder of the writable bytes are discarded. If n is greater than the number of writable bytes, all writable bytes are appended to the readable bytes. All buffers sequences previously obtained using basic_flat_buffer::data or basic_flat_buffer::prepare become invalid.

Parameters

Name

Description

n

The number of bytes to append. If this number is greater than the number of writable bytes, all writable bytes are appended.

Exception Safety

No-throw guarantee.
